page.discussion: The <TBL>.RELATION_GET() method is used for determining the structure of a set. It returns the type of relationship between the table referenced by <TBL> and that table's parent table. Link_Type are: "First", "Last", "Closest", "Many" and "Many, Integrity". These match the options available in the Set Editor.

section.title: Example
section.description: This session in the Interactive Window shows how a set's structure can be explored.
The next series of commands determine the names of all of the tables in the set, but do not give the structure.
